title: Sydney escort reveals all: ‘I have sex with married men at 7am’ | Gold Coast Bulletin
text:
Sydney escort, 25, who charges $550 an hour and has bedded over 1100 men reveals all in candid Reddit thread news.com.au February 20, 2017 10:47am 
A SYDNEY woman who claims to be an escort has revealed the tricks of the trade in a very candid Reddit thread. 
The 25-year-old, who does not give her name, says she started working in a “high-profile brothel” five years ago. 
Since then she has worked in six different sex houses across Sydney, Melbourne and Perth. 
“In early 2014, fed up with brothel life, I moved to Perth to set myself up as a private escort,” she confesses online. 
“One year later I had a mental breakdown and left the industry for nine months. 
“I returned nearly a year ago, this time in Sydney and I haven’t looked back since.” 
On the revealing forum, the woman says she charges up to $550 an hour, sees married men early in the morning and takes Ubers to and from jobs. 
“I often see married clients early in the morning, eg 7-8am,” she says. 
“Even though they’re philandering, most still have some respect for their wives, if not as lovers, then as people, mothers. 
“Many are in functioning, co-parenting relationships but live like roommates.” 
She says that escorting can be a very unstable industry and work tends to die down around Christmas time. 
“I went 23 December 2016 to 21 January 2017 without any bookings because it is typically the quietest time of year for the sex industry,” she said. 
“Then suddenly it picked up massively and I’ve had 2-3 bookings per week since, averaging about 3 grand per week. media_camera The woman says she usually sees married men early in the morning. Picture: Lorraine Hanna 
“Last October I didn’t get any bookings for about 3 weeks. It’s unpredictable to say the least.” 
Her usual clientele consists of businessmen aged 40 and over, and she usually has the most fun with “fat men”. 
“Most white-collar type professions, more caucasian, Indian and Asian than other races, and mostly in the 40-60 age group,” she says. 
“I’m happy with this, because these guys are well mannered and really generous.” 
She also claims to have had sex with more than 1100 men — and the oldest client she ever had was a Holocaust survivor. media_camera The sex worker revealed all on Reddit. 
She revealed she is not a “knockout model” but channels the “girl-next-door type of look”. 
Famous clients have included “NRL and union players,” as well as members of biker gangs — although she has kept specific names under wraps. 
She also states she’s open to many bizarre fantasies but will not do water or mud sports, long bookings out of the city, or incest role play. 
“I don’t have it in me to act it out. I have a few brothers,” she explains. “I remember watching Gladiator with one of them. That was awkward for us.” 
She also has a strict no-Irish policy. 
“I have a no-Irish policy, for all the reasons you’d imagine,” she says, without elaborating further. 
Her mother, best friends and ex-boyfriends know about her job as an escort — but she is afraid of her father and brothers finding out. 
“I broke down and confessed everything to my parents about having been a sex worker for years about 2 years ago while I was on hiatus,” she wrote. 
“Only my mum knows I’ve returned. She doesn’t want me to tell [my dad] because otherwise she’d ‘never hear the end of it’. 
“But I think deep down he knows.” 
She plans to “retire in June” when she is set to move overseas and study for a Masters. Sex Trade 45:08 
WARNING - Graphic Content: These women appear to lead normal lives, but they each have second jobs, catering to the most basic of human desires. December 10th 2015
